title: Why Did So Many More Women Than Men Die in the Itaewon Halloween Disaster?
description: Evidence that women may face greater risks in crowd crushes is inconclusive, an expert said.
dc:creator: Jin Yu Young

media:content.media:credit: Anthony Wallace/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:content.media:description: There were several factors that could have led to higher fatalities in women.
